thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 25 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF- Shenzhen Sunshine Laser & Electronics Technology sees 2017 net profit up 270 pct to 300 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF- Shenzhen Sunshine Laser & Electronics Technology sees 2017 net profit up 270 pct to 300 pct

organizations.name: shenzhen sunshine laser & electronics technology co ltd

text:
Jan 26(Reuters) - Shenzhen Sunshine Laser & Electronics Technology Co Ltd
* Sees 2017 net profit to increase by 270 percent to 300 percent, or to be 60 million yuan to 64.9 million yuan
* Says 2016 net profit was 16.2 million yuan
* Says that increased business sales income and inclusion of new company as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/q5vj4m
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
